thread.title: Monday's TV pick: Scream Queens

title: Monday's TV pick: Scream Queens
text:
Submit Emma Roberts and Jamie Lee Curtis lead the cast in this new black-comedy-slasher-flick-style show Scream Queens . Every character has a motive for murder, but they could all be the next victim as well as a killer is on the loose around an American university. 
Â© Channel 4 It's been 20 years since Kappa House sorority held a party that ended in tragedy. They've put the past behind them now and new president Chanel Oberlin wants only the best students to pledge. But anti-Kappa Dean Cath Munsch has decreed pledging should be open to all female students, making Chanel angry.It's not long before a killer disguised as a devil begins wreaking havoc across campus on the 20th anniversary of Kappa House's party. Who is the murderer? Scream Queens, E4, 10pm
